footer.tagline: Your life in music. Track, rate, and discover amazing music with friends.

about.title: About Tuniverse
about.subtitle: Your life in music. We're building the ultimate music social network.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Tuniverse was born from a simple idea: music deserves its own social network. Just like Letterboxd revolutionized how we track and share our favorite films, we wanted to create the same experience for music lovers.
story.p2: We believe that music is more than just entertainment‚Äîit's a journey, a memory, an emotion. Every song tells a story, and every listener has a unique perspective. Tuniverse gives you the tools to capture, share, and discover those stories.
story.p3: From rating your favorite albums to discovering new artists through your friends' recommendations, Tuniverse is designed to enhance how you experience music in the digital age.

connect.title: Connect Through Music
connect.description: Build meaningful connections with people who share your musical taste and discover new sounds together.

track.title: Track Your Journey
track.description: Keep a detailed record of your musical exploration and see how your taste evolves over time.

discover.title: Discover More
discover.description: Get personalized recommendations and explore music beyond the algorithm's usual suggestions.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: Passionate about music and technology, Furkan created Tuniverse to bring music lovers together in a meaningful way. With a background in software development and a love for discovering new music, he's dedicated to building the best music social network.

creative.title: üé® Creative Expression
creative.description: We believe everyone has unique musical taste worth sharing. Tuniverse gives you the canvas to express yourself.

community.title: ü§ù Community First
community.description: Our community shapes Tuniverse. We listen to feedback and build features that matter to you.

privacy.title: üîí Privacy Matters
privacy.description: Your data is yours. We're transparent about what we collect and never sell your information.

innovation.title: üöÄ Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: Music and technology evolve. We're committed to constantly improving and adding new features.

cta.title: Join the Music Revolution
cta.subtitle: Be part of a community that celebrates music in all its forms.
